title: Otago University!
body:
Hey scarfies!

My name is Matt and I'm the president of the Otago University Esports Club. Last semester we had a very successful team make it to the top 16 stage of the OCC and this semester we're looking to go even further!

I highly recommend any Otago students to sign up and participate in this excellent competition. I will do my very best to make sure that you have a way to participate even if you are a single summoner looking for a team.

First up find our facebook group here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1389690251332401/

Once you've joined up there you can find discussions from other members and hopefully find like minded players for a team.

Next up I'll be creating a "solo queue" roster for anyone to find a team easily. Simply sign up and I'll either create a team of 5 from the roster or place you into a team that is only looking for one or two more members. To do this you'll need to be part of the facebook group as that is where I do most of my organisation.

So get your flatties together and get ready to take Otago to the finals in Sydney!

replies.body:
Hey man here is the sign up page for the competition itself

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ouc-team-registration
I still can't find a page where we actually sign up for the competition, has anyone organised one yet?
